heading: Feralsâ€™ Den Dungeon Guide
content: Ferals' Den is an incredibly long dungeon with a difficult boss making it only worth one completion for the Renown and . Avoid this dungeon for Nightmare Sigils! While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! This dungeon is not accessible until you cleanse out the evil in . This unlocks the Dungeon. This can be done solo, but goes by quicker with a group of friends. Reviewed by
